suite.doc: Aqui estarão presentes as resoluções de todos os exercícios da Prime Heroes É muito importante informarmos o propósito desse documento.

suite.name: Mobileautomation

test.name: Caso de Teste 01: Pesquisa canal "Prime Experts"

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

kw.name: Dado que o cliente esteja na página de Home
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Element Attribute Should Match
kw.doc: Verify that an attribute of an element matches the expected criteria.

kw.name: E pesquise um vídeo sobre "Prime Experts"
Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Prime Experts' into text field 'id=search_edit_text'

kw.name: Press Keycode
kw.doc: Sends a press of keycode to the device.

kw.name: E acesse o canal da Prime
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.arg: xpath=//android.view.ViewGroup[contains(@content-desc,"Prime Experts - Parceria entre Prime Control e UniBrasil")]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.arg: xpath=//android.view.ViewGroup[contains(@content-desc,"Prime Experts - Parceria entre Prime Control e UniBrasil")]
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//android.view.ViewGroup[contains(@content-desc,"Prime Experts - Parceria entre Prime Control e UniBrasil")]'.

suite.doc: Aqui neste arquivo estarão presentes os cenários e keywords que dizem respeito a automação mobile

suite.name: Webautomation

test.name: Caso de Teste 01: Pesquisar Produto Existente

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Acessar a página home do site Automation Practice
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Digitar o nome do produto "Blouse" no campo de pesquisa
kw.sourcename: Digitar o nome do produto "${PRODUTO}" no campo de pesquisa

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.doc: Verifies image identified by ``locator`` is found from current page.

kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.doc: Aqui estarão todos os testes Web do curso Prime Hero. A ideia e criarmos cenários de verificação com a library Selenium.
